pl.szczurowsky.ratorm.database

Interface Database

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoDB

    public interface Database
    Basic interface of database which would be initiated at the begging. Contains all methods and fields required to work

      throws AlreadyConnectedException
        Connect to database via connection url
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        AlreadyConnectedException - Already connected to database

      throws AlreadyConnectedException
        Connect to database via credentials

      • registerSerializer

        void registerSerializer(java.lang.Class<?> serializedObjectClass,
                        java.lang.Class<? extends Serializer> serializerClass)
        Register new object serializer
        Parameters:
        serializedObjectClass - Class of object which is going to be used with provided serializer
        serializerClass - Class of serializer

      • initModel

        <T extends BaseModel> void initModel(java.lang.Class<T>... modelClasses)
                              throws ModelAnnotationMissingException,
                                     MoreThanOnePrimaryKeyException,
                                     NoPrimaryKeyException
        Initialize table in database. If table not existing in database than creating it. If exists than load
        Parameters:
        modelClasses - One or multiple class of models
        Throws:
        ModelAnnotationMissingException - Exception when model is not using @Model annotation
        MoreThanOnePrimaryKeyException - Exception when model have more than one field set as primary key
        NoPrimaryKeyException - Exception when model don't have field as primary key

      • fetchAll

        <T extends BaseModel> java.util.List<T> fetchAll(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
                                          throws ModelAnnotationMissingException,
                                                 NotConnectedToDatabaseException,
                                                 ModelNotInitializedException,
                                                 NoSerializerFoundException,
                                                 java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                 java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Fetch all objects which matches model class
        Type Parameters:
        T - Model class
        Parameters:
        modelClass - Model class
        Returns:
        List of fetched objects
        Throws:
        ModelAnnotationMissingException - Exception when model is not using @Model annotation
        NotConnectedToDatabaseException - Not connected to database
        ModelNotInitializedException - Model wasn't initialized
        NoSerializerFoundException - Serializer for field model wasn't found
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - Java exception when wasn't able to invoke method
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Java exception when model class wasn't able to create own instance
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Java security exception

                                                      ModelNotInitializedException,

                                                      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                      java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Fetch all objects which match provided conditions
        Type Parameters:
        T - Model class
        Parameters:
        modelClass - Model class
        key - Object key in database (field name)
        value - Not serialized value of field
        Returns:
        List of fetched objects
        Throws:
        ModelAnnotationMissingException - Exception when model is not using @Model annotation
        NotConnectedToDatabaseException - Not connected to database

                                               java.lang.String field,
                                               FilterExpression expression,
                                               java.lang.Object value,
                                               java.util.stream.Stream<T> objects)
        Returns all object which match
        Type Parameters:
        T - Model class
        Parameters:
        modelClass - class of object model
        field - matching field
        expression - expression from enum
        value - matched value to field
        objects - provided stream of objects
        Returns:
        Array of objects which matched expression

        value - matched value to field

      • updateWholeCache

        void updateWholeCache(java.lang.Object object,
                      java.lang.Class<? extends BaseModel> modelClass)
               throws NotCachedException,
                      NoSerializerFoundException,
                      NotConnectedToDatabaseException,
                      ModelNotInitializedException,
                      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                      ModelAnnotationMissingException,
                      java.lang.InstantiationException,
                      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Refresh whole cache - purging cache and replace it with object from database
        Parameters:
        object - object
        modelClass - Model class
        Throws:
        NotCachedException - Exception when user tries to read object from cache which don't have cache enabled
        ModelAnnotationMissingException - Exception when model is not using @Model annotation
        NotConnectedToDatabaseException - Not connected to database
        ModelNotInitializedException - Model wasn't initialized
        NoSerializerFoundException - Serializer for field model wasn't found
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - Java exception when wasn't able to invoke method
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Java exception when model class wasn't able to create own instance
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Java security exception
